JULAppender - Class in com.github.wolf480pl.log4j2_to_jul.appender

JULContext - Class in com.github.wolf480pl.log4j2_to_jul.context
An implementation of LoggerContext that creates JULLoggers which redirect all the logging to a Logger whose name is the name of the JULLogger appended after the prefix of the JULContext.
